home.description: A brand new web Visual Novel engine

home.title: WebGAL
home.subTitle: A brand new web Visual Novel engine

games.webgalGamesInfo: We've picked a few games created using WebGAL

disclaimerInfo.line0: This page is not for downloading games, it is only for collecting games created using WebGAL
disclaimerInfo.line1: Games published by non-WebGAL devs are not related to the WebGAL devs
disclaimerInfo.line2: If a game infringes on your rights, please send an email to

niceUI.title: Nice UI
niceUI.info: Aesthetically pleasing and elegant graphical user interface with interactive effects, providing a better using experience.

fullFunction.title: Full Function
fullFunction.info: WebGAL not only supports most of the features found in mainstream visual novel engines, but you can also use Pixi.js to add custom effects to your game.

easyToDevelop.title: Easy to develop
easyToDevelop.info: Whether you use WebGAL scripting or the visual editor for development, it is simple and natural.

info.line0: Once coding, it can run on most platforms. There is no need of Html5 knowledge. You can learn and understand the core function within 3 minutes.
info.line1: With your idea, strat creating your OWN visual novel !

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.line0: WebGAL and WebGAL Terre are licensed under the MPL-2.0
openSource.line1: Free to use for non-commercial and commercial projects

multiplatform.title: Multi Platform
multiplatform.line0: WebGAL Terre support Windows / macOS / Linux
multiplatform.line1: Export game support Web / Windows / macOS / Linux / android

readFirst.getHelp: If you encounter problems during development, please see the game development guide first, and if you can't solve them, please go to GitHub or the community to get help
